page.title: 01EGGLESCLIFFE AND DISTRICT
page.content: Most of the land is devoted to farming and the residential areas of Egglescliffe, Eaglescliffe and Preston on Tees, although the area has the Royal Navy Distribution Centre and some industry at Urlay Nook and on the Eaglescliffe Industrial Estate. These attract employees from the immediate locality as well as from the larger towns nearby. Many of the people living here commute to work in Darlington and other parts of Cleveland. One of the reasons for settlement of the area was due to its importance as a centre of communication based on easy river access linked with roads and later railways.This is still a valuable asset to the area with main road (A19 and A1(M)) and rail (London to Edinburgh) routes close at hand, while Teesside Airport is also nearby.
